{{Wired embedded system |brand=Allo |model=Piano 2.1 Player |manuf_country=India |is_manuf=No |manuf=CEM Solutions Pvt |type=media player |pwr_v=5 |pwr_amp=3 |pwr_conn=barrel |pwr_barrel_outer=5.5 |pwr_barrel_inner=2.1 |cpu1_brand=Actions Semi |cpu1_model=S500 |cpu1_cspeed=1.1 GHz |fla1=512 KiB |fla1_brand=STMicro |fla1_model=ST25PE40VP |fla2=4 KiB |fla2_brand=STMicro |fla2_model=M24C32-F |ram1=1 GiB |ram1_brand=Samsung |ram1_model=K4B4G1646D-BYK0 |ram1_num=2 |ram2=4 |ram2_brand=ISSI |ram2_model=IS61WV25616EDBLL |expansion_if_types=USB 2.0, USB 3.0, eMMC module connector, |expansion_usb_num=3 |eth_cpu=true |eth_chip2_brand=CoreChips |eth_chip2_model=SR8201G |lan_speed=100M |lan_ports=1 |addl_chips=PMU Audio Subsystem;Actions Semi;ATC2603C;;1;,,, USB 2.0 High Speed 4-Port Hub Controller;JFD;FE1.1s;;1;,,, PLD/FPGA;Lattice;LCMX03L-4300C;;1;,,, 2V RMS 112dB Audio Stereo DAC w/PCM Interface;TI;PCM5142;;2;,,, |flags=Micro SD Card slot, HDMI, MIPI DSI, MIPI CSI, IR receiver, RCA, GPIO |stock_boot=U-Boot; |stock_os=Linux;3.10.38;Ubuntu 12.04 |tp_firmware=Volumio, DietPi, Max2Play |default_ip=acquired via DHCP |default_user=root |default_pass=sparky |oui_eth=00:17:F7, }} {{TagLine|PIANO 2.1 PLAYER}} :[https://www.allo.com/sparky/piano-2-1-player.html Product page]
Comprised of the [[Allo Sparky]] SBC a Kali Reclocker HAT and a Piano 2.1 HAT.
*[https://www.cnx-software.com/2016/09/03/allo-sparky-audio-kit-combines-an-arm-linux-board-with-amplifier-audio-dac-reclocker-and-capacitance-multiplier-boards/ ''Allo Sparky Audio Kit Combines an ARM Linux Board with Amplifier, Audio DAC, Reclocker and Capacitance Multiplier Boards'' on '''CNXSOFT''' ]
